title: Final Summary (Post-Debate)
description: Provide closure to the simulator by reflecting on strategies, key decisions, and final campaign outcomes.

tasks.prompt: Reflect on your campaign journey. Review AI-generated stats and narrative summary. Consider lessons for future strategy and constituent engagement.

narrator: This module wraps up your campaign. The AI compiles final stats, highlights strengths and weaknesses, and delivers a personalized narrative tying your actions to electoral results.
readingSummary: Final stats include Candidate Coins (CC), signatures, voter approval, and major spending decisions.
Path taken (Independent or party), endorsements, petitions, debates, and strategic turning points are summarized.
Strengths and weaknesses are highlighted, emphasizing clear messaging, debate performance, and moral or strategic decisions.

outcome.description: Consolidated campaign results with final CC, voter approval, and key decisions. AI provides narrative closure showing how simulation choices affect electoral outcomes.

victoryThresholds.competitive: 35–49% voter approval (credible showing short of victory)
victoryThresholds.spoiler: 20–34% voter approval (influenced race but not competitive)
